programme.title: My Cat from Hell
programme.desc: Behaviourist Jackson Galaxy is in Philadelphia to help a cat named Charlee rebuild the confidence that her feline sister Frankie has nearly beaten out of her

programme.title: Lone Star Law
programme.desc: Game Warden Albert Flores enforces fishing laws, staking out illegal night shrimpers. Warden Jayme Deschaaf ensures dove hunters follow the migratory bird laws

programme.title: Dr Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: Dr Jeff tries to mend a German shepherds broken elbow for its war veteran owner, and a cat with a swollen bladder needs difficult surgery to save its life

programme.title: Earths Seasonal Secrets
programme.desc: Documentary exploring how animals all over the world rise to the challenge of surviving the winter. While some creatures face an up-hill struggle to survive, a colder climate plays to the advantage of others, who quickly set about making use of inventive means to seize the huge opportunities the season brings. Caribou become ice road travellers as the ground under-foot becomes slippery, and stoats build their own fur beds, snow monkeys set about finding warm baths, and even Emperor penguins - who are built to face extreme low temperatures - find their own way to endure the worlds most savage winter conditions. Narrated by Andrew Scott

programme.title: Treasures of the Anglo-Saxons
programme.desc: Historian Janina Ramirez investigates the development of Anglo-Saxon art. Examining the Sutton Hoo treasures the Franks Casket, the Staffordshire Hoard and the Lindisfarne Gospels, she uncovers the secret codes and symbols that reveal the pagan past and Christian future of the Anglo-Saxon people, and discusses how their artistic development was brought to an end by the Norman invasion of 1066

programme.title: Call My Bluff
programme.desc: Robert Robinson presides over another duel of words and wits as Frank Muir, Joan Bakewell and Noel Edmonds face Patrick Campbell, Judy Geeson and Edward Woodward. First broadcast in 1975

programme.title: Face the Music
programme.desc: Joseph Cooper invites viewers to match their musical wits against panellists Joyce Grenfell, Robin Ray and Bernard Levin. With guest musicians Cyril Smith and Phyllis Sellick. First broadcast 1974

programme.title: Romes Invisible City
programme.desc: Alexander Armstrong is joined by Dr Michael Scott to explore the underground treasures that made Rome the powerhouse of the ancient world. Using 3D scanning technology, he uncovers the lost subterranean world of the Colosseum, as well as the aqueducts and sewers that supplied and cleansed it, and helped run civilisations first metropolis and its empire

programme.title: The Great Philosophers
programme.desc: Bryan Magee is joined by Alfred J Ayer to discuss the ideas of German Gottlob Frege, as well as English philosopher Bertrand Russells pioneering work in mathematical logic

programme.title: The Great Philosophers
programme.desc: Bryan Magee and John Searle examines the work of Austria-born British philosopher Ludwig Wittgenstein, who transformed peoples conception of the role of language in human thinking and whose influence spread far and wide beyond philosophy

programme.title: In My Own Words
programme.sub-title: In My Own Words: Yinka Shonibare
programme.desc: The British-Nigerian visual artist Yinka Shonibare gives a rare interview about his life and career, prompted by archive footage, photographs and home movies. Topics include the moment his sculpture, Nelsons Ship in a Bottle, was unveiled on the fourth plinth in Trafalgar Square in 2010, and his emotional homecoming trip to Nigeria - the first time he had been able to go back to see friends and family for 30 years. He also talks about the impact of the spinal virus he contracted as a teenager, which left him paralysed down one side of his body

programme.title: What Do Artists Do All Day?
programme.desc: Following Yinka Shonibare as he creates distinctive mannequin-like figures, which are anonymous, headless and dressed in African batik fabrics. The artist also talks about his life and career, with his work being influenced by his Nigerian origins and combining darkness and humour to challenge ideas about cultural identity and the post-colonial world

programme.title: Treasures of the Anglo-Saxons
programme.desc: Historian Janina Ramirez investigates the development of Anglo-Saxon art. Examining the Sutton Hoo treasures the Franks Casket, the Staffordshire Hoard and the Lindisfarne Gospels, she uncovers the secret codes and symbols that reveal the pagan past and Christian future of the Anglo-Saxon people, and discusses how their artistic development was brought to an end by the Norman invasion of 1066

programme.title: Earths Seasonal Secrets
programme.desc: Documentary exploring how animals all over the world rise to the challenge of surviving the winter. While some creatures face an up-hill struggle to survive, a colder climate plays to the advantage of others, who quickly set about making use of inventive means to seize the huge opportunities the season brings. Caribou become ice road travellers as the ground under-foot becomes slippery, and stoats build their own fur beds, snow monkeys set about finding warm baths, and even Emperor penguins - who are built to face extreme low temperatures - find their own way to endure the worlds most savage winter conditions. Narrated by Andrew Scott

programme.title: Winter Walks
programme.desc: Selina Scott enjoys a gentle walk around Wharfedale in the Yorkshire Dales. Along the way, she learns stories of extraordinary philanthropy, meets walkers and a fisherman, and ends her journey drinking local ale in a pub famed for ferret racing

programme.title: Christmas University Challenge
programme.desc: Teams of distinguished graduates compete on behalf of their former universities in the academic quizs festive incarnation, with the opening first-round match seeing SOAS University of London take on Balliol College, Oxford Among those facing questions from host Jeremy Paxman are author and broadcaster Emma Dabiri, and crime writer Martin Edwards

programme.title: The Morecambe and Wise Show
programme.sub-title: Ernie Wise Introduces Morecambe and Wise Classics
programme.desc: Featuring highlights from some of the most successful shows made by the comedic duo. Guest stars are Tom Jones, Des OConnor, Cliff Richard and Diana Rigg. Robin Nash presents. First broadcast 31 December 1987

programme.title: The Morecambe and Wise Show
programme.sub-title: The Morecambe and Wise Show 1970 - The Lost Tape
programme.desc: A complete episode of the comedy duos show that had been considered lost for more than 50 years, but was discovered in an unmarked film can in 2020 by Eric Morecambes son Gary. Now it has been restored and can be enjoyed in full for the first time since being first broadcast on October 8, 1970. Aside from classic sketches, there is music by Paul Anka, Patricia Lambert and Kenny Ball and his Jazzmen, with Eric and Ernie themselves rounding things off with a burst of Bring Me Sunshine

programme.title: The Perfect Morecambe and Wise
programme.desc: Another selection of classic sketches and routines from the double acts shows. The boys re-enact a scene from Singin in the Rain and Eric decides to take on the role of Shakespeares Hamlet. Flora Robson is the virgin queen, Eric goes back to school in Top of the Form, and Cilla Black has good news for Ernie regarding his recording career

programme.title: The Black Swan
programme.desc: How tensions came to a head as the investors in the money laundering scam wanted their money out before its mastermind was arrested as, suspecting illegal activity, the bank froze all his assets

programme.title: The Black Swan
programme.desc: A look at when the film-makers became aware that not everything was as it seemed. Their collaboration with Amira Smajic was rocked when deleted files were discovered on a recording device she had been wearing

programme.title: Britains Outlaws: Highwaymen, Pirates and Rogues
programme.desc: Historian Sam Willis explores the golden age of piracy during the early 18th century, when Captain Kidd, Blackbeard, Calico Jack and others were in operation on the high seas. He charts the devastating impact they had during an era of colonial expansion and how they became the most wanted outlaws in the world by plundering the vast network of maritime trade, they became the most wanted outlaws in the world

programme.title: Horizon
programme.sub-title: The Wildest Weather in the Universe: Horizon
programme.desc: Documentary following scientists conducting research into weather on other planets, using unmanned spacecraft to study the solar system and the latest telescopes to examine distant worlds. Their findings have revealed strange phenomena including rains of precious stones, supersonic winds, storms that encompass entire worlds, and temperatures so hot that the clouds are formed of lava

programme.title: Romes Invisible City
programme.desc: Alexander Armstrong is joined by Dr Michael Scott to explore the underground treasures that made Rome the powerhouse of the ancient world. Using 3D scanning technology, he uncovers the lost subterranean world of the Colosseum, as well as the aqueducts and sewers that supplied and cleansed it, and helped run civilisations first metropolis and its empire

He charts the devastating impact they had during an era of colonial expansion and how they became the most wanted outlaws in the world by plundering the vast network of maritime trade, they became the most wanted outlaws in the world

programme.title: Breakfast
programme.desc: A round-up of national and international news, plus current affairs, arts and entertainment, and weather

programme.title: Morning Live
programme.desc: Rav Wilding and Helen Skelton host the weekday magazine show featuring a mixture of topical discussion and expert advice for viewers

programme.title: Rip Off Britain
programme.sub-title: Scammers Used Our Street to Open Fake Accounts
programme.desc: The first of a special run of episodes for BBC Scam Safe Week. The team investigates the fake bank accounts all registered in one Cheshire street, and question if the bank responsible does enough to stop scammers opening accounts

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: Dion Dublin has trouble figuring out the layout of a mid-terrace house in South Yorkshire and Tommy Walsh visits a property with garden problems in east London. Martel Maxwell navigates her way around a nicotine-stained terraced house in Darlington

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Christina Trevanion hosts a special episode for Scam Week, with tips on avoiding buying fakes. Izzie Balmer and Nick Hall assist the teams at an antiques fair in Derbyshire

programme.title: BBC News at One; Weather
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: BBC Newsline; Weather
programme.desc: Local news worth watching from across Northern Ireland

programme.title: BBC News at One; Weather
programme.desc: A round-up of the latest headlines

programme.title: Scam Interceptors
programme.desc: Amanda Holden joins the team for a special episode for Scam Safe Week, in which she helps them go after the criminals who used her name and image to con victims out of thousands. Using the same remote access tech scammers rely on, the team will hack the hackers to monitor their operations in real time, before confronting the fraudsters, and stopping scams before they happen

programme.title: Make It at Market
programme.desc: Now retired, ex-police officer Neil wants to build a successful woodworking business, So far however, the orders havent been coming in. Mentor Bruce thinks hes doing too much and needs to create a core range to have a chance at success. When her father died, Catherine decided to make her embroidery business dreams a reality, but hasnt been able to earn a living from it. Her mentor Stephanie thinks she has great potential, but is spreading herself too thin and needs to streamline her work. Presented by Dominic Chinea

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: City-dwelling families, couples and individuals set out to find their ideal rural retreats with the help of a property expert

programme.title: The Bidding Room
programme.sub-title: Pig Condiment Set, Thorloux Lights, Peaches and Cream Barbie
programme.desc: Traders try to make a deal on a rare doll, a pig cruet set, an Italian vintage Ferragamo coat, a 1960s travel poster, and a set of industrial-chic Thorlux lights

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Natasha Raskin Sharp and Tim Medhurst begin a Scottish road trip in the Highlands, where they come across pieces of Georgian jewellery and neoclassical masonry

programme.title: Pointless
programme.desc: Quiz show in which four pairs of contestants have to score the fewest points possible by giving the least obvious answers to questions posed to 100 people before the show. At the end of each round, the team with the most points is eliminated until the final two pairs battle for a cash prize. Presented by Alexander Armstrong and Mel Giedroyc

programme.title: BBC News at Six; Weather
programme.desc: The latest headlines

programme.title: Hope Street
programme.desc: When a classic car is stolen from a local showroom, it looks like a disgruntled employee has taken his revenge after being sacked. The cops soon discover that bodybuilder Aaron has been displaying aggressive behaviour and suspicions are raised that he has been taking steroids, possibly supplied by Donals secret girlfriend Sasha. Brandi thinks Clint should tell Nicole hes lost £25,000, but Clint is hoping hell get the cash back before she finds out

programme.title: If Walls Could Talk
programme.desc: The Oval Stadium, home of Glentoran FC in East Belfast, has weathered war, reconstruction and financial hardship, remaining a cherished landmark for football fans, not just from East Belfast, but from all across the globe

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: Cindy goes looking for answers, Vicki continues to struggle, and Laurens hopes are raised, but all may not be as it seems

programme.title: Scam Interceptors
programme.desc: Amanda Holden joins the team for a special episode for Scam Safe Week, in which she helps them go after the criminals who used her name and image to con victims out of thousands. Using the same remote access tech scammers rely on, the team will hack the hackers to monitor their operations in real time, before confronting the fraudsters, and stopping scams before they happen

programme.title: Prisoner 951
programme.desc: Nazanin is flown back to Tehran and locked away in solitary confinement, in a tiny cell with its bright white strobe light on 24 hours a day, and just a blanket on the floor to sleep on. She endures endless interrogations, accused over and over again of being a spy. Richard becomes increasingly frustrated by the UK governments seeming inaction, and uncovers a secret decades-old UK arms deal debt to Iran that could be the key to securing Nazanins release

programme.title: BBC News at Ten
programme.desc: A round-up of todays headlines

programme.title: George Best: All By Himself
programme.desc: Documentary telling the story of the reserved young football prodigy from Belfast who became a global superstar, but whose career was blighted by his battle with the pressures of fame. The film reveals how the player dubbed El Beatle helped Manchester United to win two league titles and the European Cup, but his extravagant lifestyle led to various problems, most notably alcoholism

programme.title: Fake Friend: The Ticket Scammer
programme.desc: The case of a Somerset high-flyer who turned his charm and connections into tools of deception, conning his friends and hundreds of others, while living a life of glamour himself. Through the voices of his victims and event industry insiders, this documentary uncovers the high personal and financial cost of chasing exclusivity, and how easily even the most cautious can be deceived

programme.title: Weather for the Week Ahead
programme.desc: A look ahead to the latest forecast

programme.title: Rip Off Britain
programme.desc: In another special edition for BBC Scam Safe Week, Louise Minchin, Julia Somerville and Gloria Hunniford hear the story of an Edinburgh woman left devastated when an online romance turned out to be a scam

programme.title: Homes Under the Hammer
programme.desc: Martin Roberts, Tommy Walsh and Martel Maxwell follow developers in Lancashire, Cheshire and Co Durham as they tackle a variety of projects. They explore grand, stone-built offices converted into a nine-bed family home, two flats that were once a pub, and a mid-terrace with a guide price of just £15,000

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Natasha Raskin Sharp heads to Nottinghamshire, where experts Ben Cooper and Izzie Balmer take the teams antique-hunting before heading to Derby for todays auction. Natasha also discovers how a 16th-century curate revolutionised the world of knitting and tries out his extraordinary invention for herself

programme.title: Scam Interceptors
programme.sub-title: Im Sorry. I Dont Know What to Do!
programme.desc: Scammers posing as the police target a young carer based in London. If she does not comply with their demands, they say they will arrest her

programme.title: Make It at Market
programme.desc: Firefighter Lisa wants to become a signwriter in the Scottish Highlands, and blacksmith Menelik is looking for financial security before proposing to his girlfriend

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Jules Hudson is in the Powys countryside, helping a couple with two dogs, three cats and a motorbike find a home. He also visits a pioneering farm project growing a greener future

programme.title: The Bidding Room
programme.sub-title: Clown Ring Toss, Podiatry Charts, Barbers Chair
programme.desc: Nigel Havers meets sellers trying to make a deal on a clown-themed ring toss game, a vintage podiatry poster, an art deco barbers chair and a lovingly restored set of drawers

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.sub-title: Fern Fever and Far East Winds
programme.desc: Natasha Raskin Sharp and Tim Medhurst arrive in Aberdeenshire, where theyre on the hunt for hidden gems and quirky curios. In New Pitsligo, Natasha haggles hard for a piece with Far Eastern flair and takes a chance on an item that falls squarely within Tims field of expertise, while he sniffs out Chinese charm and Victorian oddities

programme.title: Pointless
programme.desc: Quiz show in which four pairs of contestants have to score the fewest points possible by giving the least obvious answers to questions posed to 100 people before the show. At the end of each round, the team with the most points is eliminated until the final two pairs battle for a cash prize. Presented by Alexander Armstrong and Mel Giedroyc

programme.title: BBC News at Six; Weather
programme.desc: The latest headlines

programme.title: The One Show
programme.desc: Another mix of nationwide reports and live studio-based chat, hosted by Angellica Bell and Alex Jones

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: Oscar makes a shocking discovery, tensions continue to rise in the Slater family, and Anna makes Freddie an offer

programme.title: Celebrity MasterChef
programme.desc: Dawn OPorter, Chris Hughes, Jaki Graham, Jamie Lomas and Michelle Heaton compete to impress judges Grace Dent and John Torode and secure a place in this weeks quarter-final. In the first challenge, the celebrities must prepare a dish based around a mystery ingredient, the likes of which include butter beans, pineapple and smoked haddock. Then they prepare the next street food success story, a dish theyd be happy to serve to the paying public

programme.title: Ambulance
programme.desc: An insight into the work of frontline staff in Yorkshire. Every second counts as critical care paramedic Zach tries to stabilise an 11-year-old boy who has been seriously injured in a multi-car collision. Leeds-based crew Ryan and Tom are called to a man who is struggling to breathe, and are then dispatched to an 89-year-old who has collapsed to the floor overnight in a state of confusion. A call handler deals with a woman who has been repeatedly jamming the phone lines with no real emergency - but this time her symptoms trigger a category one response, the highest level for life-threatening situations

programme.title: BBC News at Ten
programme.desc: A round-up of todays headlines

programme.title: Billy Connolly: Big Banana Feet
programme.desc: The long-lost film of Billy Connollys 1975 tour of Ireland captures The Big Yin both on and off stage, and provides a captivating record of the future comedy legend on the cusp of international stardom

programme.title: The Idea of You
programme.desc: Forty-year-old gallery owner and single mother Solène takes her daughter to a music festival, where she crosses paths with 24-year-old singer Hayes - the lead singer of a world-famous boy band - and the two begin a whirlwind romance. But the couple soon find themselves at the centre of a social media storm when fans of the band discover Hayes is dating an older woman. Romance, starring Anne Hathaway and Nicholas Galitzine. Based on the novel by Robinne Lee

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: The latest national and international stories as they break

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: In honour of the Womens World Cup, former England player Jill Scott is joined by Rattus for a journey through the history of football

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Rattus has an idea that might make him millions - he is going to launch a streaming service. However, to make Ratify a success, he is going to need some great songs from history

programme.title: The Catch Up
programme.desc: A round-up of the days news

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson and James May pay tribute to Saab, the Swedish car manufacturer that created several successful models since the late 1940s, but has now ceased production. Richard Hammond takes the passengers seat in a Skoda rally car that races a rocket-propelled flying man, and actor Matt Smith gets behind the wheel of the Reasonably Priced Car. Jeremy also shreds the tyres of the noisy Maserati GranTurismo MC Stradale and the 510bhp Mercedes-Benz C63 AMG Black Series

programme.title: Fake Friend: The Ticket Scammer
programme.desc: The case of a Somerset high-flyer who turned his charm and connections into tools of deception, conning his friends and hundreds of others, while living a life of glamour himself. Through the voices of his victims and event industry insiders, this documentary uncovers the high personal and financial cost of chasing exclusivity, and how easily even the most cautious can be deceived

programme.title: Confessions of a Teenage Fraudster
programme.desc: How a 16-year-old used his job in a call centre in Glasgow to go on a five-year crime wave, defrauding innocent cardholders and laying the groundwork for a life of wealth, first-class travel and an escape from the life he was destined for

programme.title: Confessions of a Teenage Fraudster
programme.desc: Between the ages of 17 and 21, Elliot Castro managed to commit fraudulent activity amounting to a estimated £2 million. This documentary continues his story. With a trail of crime stretching across several continents as he continued to live life on the run, then 18-year-old Elliot became more paranoid than ever and a stint in foreign jail seemed just around the corner

programme.title: Confessions of a Teenage Fraudster
programme.desc: After four years travelling the world spending fraudulently accrued money, it seems inevitable that Elliot will be deported into the hands of British police, who have put together an extensive case of his crimes. Once again though, he has other ideas. In truth, the one thing Elliot desires as much as freedom is a settled life. But even when he thinks hes found it, with a new home and friends, there is no escape from his trail of lies and deception. Eventually, justice seems set to catch up with him

programme.title: Hunting the Catfish Crime Gang
programme.desc: The story of an entrepreneur whose identity was stolen and used for criminal activities online, leaving him facing messages from people accusing him of conning them out of tens of thousands of pounds. His attempt to find out more and get his online identity back takes him on an international journey and he discovers that its not only those being conned who are the victims. Many of those carrying out the con are suffering too - at the hands of gangs behind this modern-day crime

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson and James May pay tribute to Saab, the Swedish car manufacturer that created several successful models since the late 1940s, but has now ceased production. Richard Hammond takes the passengers seat in a Skoda rally car that races a rocket-propelled flying man, and actor Matt Smith gets behind the wheel of the Reasonably Priced Car. Jeremy also shreds the tyres of the noisy Maserati GranTurismo MC Stradale and the 510bhp Mercedes-Benz C63 AMG Black Series

programme.title: BBC New Comedy Awards
programme.desc: Dane Buckley hosts the contest at Mandela Hall, Belfast, where five comics compete in the last of six knockout heats to bag their place in the grand final. Award-winning comedian and podcaster Alison Spittle and former NCA finalist William Thompson join head judge Fatiha El-Ghorri to assess the potential of contenders Eoghan Collins, Pravanya Pillay, Vinny Shiu, Lianna Holston and Jim Midge

programme.title: BBC Comedy Short Films
programme.desc: Two burglars break into a house, where they come across a man already tied up. Comedy short, written by and starring Stephen Buchanan and Martin Quinn

programme.title: Tommy: The Good. The Bad. The Fury
programme.desc: Tommys fight for redemption continues, but this time, its a battle for his own mind. Struggling to secure a new opponent, he knows a comeback fight is crucial for his mental health. Meanwhile, Molly-Maes new series trailer drops, pushing Tommy to face his own truths in the toughest interview of his life, where he opens up about his battle with alcohol addiction. Back in training, hope returns as a potential fight looms, leading him and his father John to a career-defining meeting

programme.title: Tommy: The Good. The Bad. The Fury
programme.desc: Tommy is hopeful that he could be fighting again soon, and he and Molly-Mae are spending more time together. Then, disaster strikes when KSI cancels the night when Roman was due to be in the fighting, claiming illness. John is furious, but decides the boys need cheering up so tells them he is taking them on a camping trip. However, neither Tommy nor Roman share their fathers love of the outdoors

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Rattus reveals daily routines throughout history, from waking in Ancient Egypt to Medieval Loo Man

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Comedian and former psychiatric nurse Jo Brand joins Rattus to host a special episode in honour of the NHSs 75th birthday

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May test the KTM X-Bow, the Morgan Three Wheeler and the Caterham R500 at Donington Park racing circuit. Jeremy also creates his own version of the Battle of Britain using an aircraft-engined Bentley and a flame-spitting BMW

programme.title: Scam Interceptors
programme.desc: Amanda Holden joins the team for a special episode for Scam Safe Week, in which she helps them go after the criminals who used her name and image to con victims out of thousands. Using the same remote access tech scammers rely on, the team will hack the hackers to monitor their operations in real time, before confronting the fraudsters, and stopping scams before they happen

programme.title: Fake Friend: The Ticket Scammer
programme.desc: The case of a Somerset high-flyer who turned his charm and connections into tools of deception, conning his friends and hundreds of others, while living a life of glamour himself. Through the voices of his victims and event industry insiders, this documentary uncovers the high personal and financial cost of chasing exclusivity, and how easily even the most cautious can be deceived

programme.title: The Eubanks: Like Father, Like Son
programme.desc: Former boxing star Chris Eubank and his son Chris Eubank Jr, who followed his father into the sport, are reunited after years apart to confront their fractured past. The film follows the pair as they explore their legacy, grief and the emotional cost of a life in the ring

programme.title: Tommy: The Good. The Bad. The Fury
programme.desc: Documentary following boxer Tommy Furys return to the ring. Tommy is at his lowest point personally and professionally, living alone in a house that was meant to be his and partner Molly-Maes forever home. His role as a father to baby Bambi brings both joy and pressure as he tries to convince Molly-Mae he is a changed man. After finally getting the medical all-clear to fight again, Tommy and his trainer and father John prepare for his return to the ring against MMA fighter Darren Till. Team Fury travels to the press conference - with John promising to be on his best behaviour

programme.title: Tommy: The Good. The Bad. The Fury
programme.desc: Tommy prepares for his first gym appearance since announcing his comeback, but with fighter Darren Till throwing threats and chaos into the mix, trainer John pulls Tommy out of the fight claiming he is unwilling to risk his sons future career. Its a crushing blow for Tommy, whos desperate for momentum and purpose. Amid the pressure, theres a flicker of hope - Tommy and partner Molly-Mae Hague are spotted together on New Years Eve, with a kiss that hints at a brighter future

programme.title: Tommy: The Good. The Bad. The Fury
programme.desc: Tommys fight for redemption continues, but this time, its a battle for his own mind. Struggling to secure a new opponent, he knows a comeback fight is crucial for his mental health. Meanwhile, Molly-Maes new series trailer drops, pushing Tommy to face his own truths in the toughest interview of his life, where he opens up about his battle with alcohol addiction. programme.title: Tommy: The Good. The Bad. The Fury
programme.desc: Tommy heads to Budapest to close the deal for the fight, but theres a hitch. With just four weeks to go, John calls the deal off because the money hasnt reached Tommys account

programme.title: Tommy: The Good. The Bad. The Fury
programme.desc: Its Tommys birthday, but theres no time for cake. With just days to go before his long-awaited comeback fight in Budapest, Tommy is pulled in every direction - juggling press conferences, promo shoots and the pressure of proving hes still got what it takes in the ring

programme.title: Daddy Issues
programme.desc: Sitcom about a father and daughter reunited when the latter falls pregnant. Exhausted Gemma, living with her three-month-old daughter, sees her formerly estranged mother Davina move in. Instead of helping, her mum lives an irritatingly carefree life. Meanwhile, father Malcolm is living back at the bedsit, sleeping on an inflatable bed on the landing. Missing her dad and in a state of despair, Gemma conspires with Malcolm and Derek to hatch a plot to oust Davina. Starring Aimee Lou Wood, David Morrissey, Jill Halfpenny and Sarah Hadland

Nearby, Glitch prepares a picnic for Ubercorn. Tala drops by to deliver some fresh bananas for the picnic and Foz spots a tiny ant on the fruit. Tala asks her Uncle to shrink her, Foz and Lars with his size-ray. The tiny Go Jetters discover the ants will accept them as one of their own if they rub the insects smell on them. Now they are no longer a threat, the team follows the ants into their tree. Ubercorn and Glitch tuck into their picnic, but an ant steals the cherry from Glitchs cake and takes it inside the tree. Unable fit inside, Glitch uses his size-ray to shrink himself and zooms after the ant. Inside the tree, the ants see Glitch as a threat and start to surround him. He makes a run for it, but they pursue him down the trunk. Glitch demands the Grimbots make him bigger again, but they miss and accidentally blast an ant with the size-ray - supersizing it!

programme.title: Go Jetters
programme.desc: The Go Jetters are going to Westman Islands, Iceland, where the worlds largest colony of Atlantic puffins gathers every year. Lars loves these tough little birds and explains how, although they spend most of their lives flying out to sea and fishing, they return to land each year to lay their eggs. When the baby birds, also called pufflings, eventually hatch, they fly out towards the ocean. But the light from nearby towns often confuses them about where to go, leading local children and adults to form puffin patrols to rescue the pufflings. Lars is excited to help out but is upset when he discovers Glitch, also a fan of puffins, is already well-known on the islands for his skills as a puffin rescuer. Although Glitch offers him a place in his puffin patrol, Lars is determined to outdo Glitch with a patrol of his own - but when he recruits a clumsy Grimbot, things take a turn for the worse...

programme.title: The King of Queens

programme.title: Everybody Loves Raymond
programme.desc: Robert begins taking Debra out swing dancing, but Ray feels they are becoming too close and schemes to break up their partnership. Comedy, starring Ray Romano

programme.desc: Niles and Frasier attend the closing of Martins favourite bar, but are shocked to discover it is being demolished by a company they have invested in. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer and David Hyde Pierce

programme.title: Frasier

programme.desc: Martin makes an election broadcast on behalf of Seattle mayoral hopeful Holden Thorpe, prompting Frasier and Niles to throw their weight behind a rival candidate - who proves highly unsuitable for public office. programme.desc: Part one of two. While visiting the island of Bora Bora with new girlfriend Madeline, Frasier is unexpectedly reunited with his ex-wife Lilith. Comedy, guest starring JoBeth Williams and Bebe Neuwirth

programme.desc: Stefan and his sous chef Billy kick off the week in Essex with restaurant classics at Toulouse. However, the king scallops and goats cheese salad starters come under fire from the couple who could be this weeks pickiest guests. Next up, Kaps and Satin offer salmon at their traditional country pub, The Bull and Willow Room. The final night gives Matt and Molly the chance to show off Matts premium culinary skills in the kitchen at the Shepherd and Dog

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc: In north Wales, Simon OBrien and Henry Cole meet Anne and her grandson Tom. Simon unearths an art deco fire guard

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Anne-Marie and Adrian have been going to Los Cristianos in southern Tenerife for 12 years and consider it their second home. They would love to buy their very own holiday home there for a maximum budget of £160,000. Jean Johansson shows them five properties, hoping at least one will be perfect enough for Anne-Marie and Adrian to put in an offer

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village
programme.desc: Becci and Micheal from Doncaster are beginning to turn a run-down Portuguese quinta into a family home. Louise and Paul are turning a storm-damaged 300-year-old French hamlet into a holiday village, and Ivano and Traceys renovation of a trulli village in Puglia in southern Italy has halted after they discovered a large crack in one of the ancient buildings

programme.title: The Great BandB Challenge
programme.desc: Six couples compete to win a five-bedroom BandB in the heart of rural France. In the first episode, three of the couples take the keys to rental properties they will run as BandBs for the week. They each have just a few hours to furnish and dress the rooms ready for their first guests arrival

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Ben Hillman helps a couple from Kent with two teenage daughters to find a perfect beachside holiday home around Spains Costa Almería, which must have a communal pool

programme.title: Channel 4 News
programme.desc: Including sport and weather

programme.title: Rory Peck Awards
programme.sub-title: Wil Davies - Crisis in Sudan: The Fight for Survival
programme.desc: Wil Davis talks about the devastation, and the tiny strands of hope, that he encountered while filming among the thousands of people displaced by the brutal civil war in Sudan. Davis is a finalist for the Rory Peck Awards 2025, which celebrates the freelance film-makers who bring the worlds stories to our screens

programme.title: Inside The Worlds Most Luxurious Motorhomes
programme.desc: A world of extraordinary motorhomes that redefine life on the road, with bespoke interiors, cutting-edge innovation, and price tags that rival supercars and private jets. In Silverstone, rising F1 star Ollie Bearman invites us inside his Hungarian-built £1.2 million motorhome-from-home. Plus, a look behind the scenes at a state-of-the-art factory producing multi-million-pound celebrity motorhomes for clients including Lady Gaga, Olivia Rodrigo and the Foo Fighters

programme.title: Summerwater
programme.desc: Annie makes tough decisions, prompting David to do something unthinkable. Meanwhile, Becky pushes Gavin to his limits, insistent on finding out who he really is and what he saw in the strange bothy. As truths come to light, Becky finds herself in a difficult position, and Gavin reveals his dangerous side

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: A mother-of-three is in resus after a severe asthma attack. As she is treated, the programme reveals how she has coped with life as a teenage mother with serious health problems. After falling in the street, 94-year-old Vera receives treatment for a head and elbow injury, and 27-year-old Josh has a potentially serious neck injury following a collision during an American football match

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: Compilation of memorable moments from the series, including a 75-year-old man with a dangerously high heart rate of over 250 beats per minute, who requires electric shock treatment to bring it down to a safe level. Plus, a woman who has abrasions to her eye from having false eyelashes fitted at a salon

programme.title: Rescue: Extreme Medics
programme.desc: An air ambulance is dispatched to the island of Mull, where 23-year-old rally driver Scott has rolled his car down a 20-foot embankment. In Glasgow city centre, the trauma team fight to save the life of a man who was hit by a bus and dragged under the wheels, while the coast guard helicopter flies to a remote sea loch to rescue a woman who has fallen 15 feet down a waterfall

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.sub-title: Lido, Anna Vincenzos and Le Bistro
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay revisits three of the restaurants he tried to save, returning to Lido, Anna Vincenzos and Le Bistro to find out whether his advice has been put to good use

programme.title: The Serpent Queen
programme.desc: Young Prince Henri returns from war with a new mistress and a baby. Diane convinces the young woman to leave, while Catherine tells a soothsayer that she must become pregnant at any cost. She is offered guidance, but a warning that there will be a price to be paid

programme.title: The Serpent Queen
programme.desc: Catherine eventually becomes a mother, but during a difficult birth, her twins do not survive. King Francis falls from his horse while hunting with Henri and Catherine

programme.title: Unreported World
programme.desc: In Tenerife, squatters are taking over homes prompting hotels and property owners to turn to hard-man evictors to get them out. The Canary Islands attract 16 million tourists a year, but a deepening housing crisis is turning the Spanish region into a battleground, as people who say they can no longer afford soaring rents are occupying other peoples properties instead. Under Spanish law, once people occupy a property for 48 hours, a court order is needed to evict them - and this can take years. Reporter Anja Popp joins a controversial new force of private eviction teams employed by property owners

programme.title: Sarah Beenys New Life in the Country
programme.desc: Sarah, Graham and their four boys tackle the interior design of their ambitious new build classic country house, this time trying to design their dream kitchen

programme.title: Hollyoaks Omnibus

A family are torn apart. Meanwhile, Tony begins his physio sessions with Mercedes support. And with the truth now revealed, tension rises between two residents. Writers: Gary Sewell, Colin ODonnell, Gareth Lemon; Dir: James Campayne; Prod Co: Lime Pictures

programme.title: The King of Queens
programme.desc: Carrie goes against Dougs wishes by asking his ex-girlfriend out to lunch in an effort to befriend her, while Spence agrees to go on a date with a man to boost his morale. Guest starring Janeane Garofalo, with Leah Remini and Patton Oswalt

programme.title: The King of Queens

programme.desc: The shrink bumps into a former friend of Martins while visiting Maris in hospital. The pair parted on bad terms, so Frasier tries to effect a reconciliation. Comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer and John Mahoney

Are any of them good enough for Roger and Paolo to put in an offer?

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village
programme.desc: Modern bureaucracy threatens to halt Louise and Pauls rebuild of a collapsed 300 year-old wall in France and in Italy, an emergency repair pushes Ivano and Traceys renovation schedule even further behind. A precarious ancient roof structure concerns custodians Becci and Micheal in Portugal

programme.title: The Great BandB Challenge
programme.desc: Its the second day of the competition and after welcoming their first guests, the battle moves to the breakfast table where dodgy cooking leaves Nichola and Roy with egg on their faces. And as more guests check in, an early arrival leads to chaos at Jacqui and Robs BandB

programme.desc: Lee Juggurnauth helps Helen and Kevin to look for their dream holiday home in or around Roquetas de Mar, on Spains Costa Almería, a popular, lively and thriving seaside town

programme.sub-title: Zaher Salah: The Anatomy of an Airstrike
programme.desc: Film-maker Zaher Saleh on a single incident in the conflict in Gaza, which saw a family in the crosshairs of military action

programme.title: The Great Celebrity Bake Off for Stand Up to Cancer
programme.desc: Matt Lucas hosts a star-studded edition of the baking challenge to raise awareness of Stand Up To Cancer. The first batch of contestants taking up the challenge set by judges Paul Hollywood and Prue Leith are David Schwimmer, Jesy Nelson, Rose Matafeo and Tom Davis, who must take on a fiddly French confection and recreate their most embarrassing celebrity fail in meringue

programme.title: Summerwater
programme.desc: A big blowout forces the residents to finally come face to face and resolve their differences. But just as the mood shifts to euphoric highs, tragedy strikes and theres a mighty fall. As intense divides form and unlikely bonds are made, the residents must work together - and a death in camp leaves the holiday-makers grappling with their guilt and searching for someone to blame

programme.title: Ghislaine Maxwell: The Making of a Monster
programme.desc: Documentary profile of the sex trafficker, being told over three nights, beginning by delving into her lavish childhood in the shadow of a tyrannical father and examining if this affected the woman she was to become. Her fathers death left the family penniless and ostracised, but Ghislaines move to New York in the early 1990s, and association with a mysterious money manager, enabled her to make a new start. But at what price?

programme.title: Ghislaine Maxwell: The Making of a Monster
programme.desc: The documentary focuses on the shocking contrast between the incredible wealth and power wielded by Ghislaine Maxwell and her partner Jeffrey Epstein in American high society, and the crimes they were committing behind closed doors. They entertained presidents and princes in fabulous properties and on a private island. But there are those who claim Maxwell enticed them into that world only to feed Epsteins sexual aberrations

programme.title: Ghislaine Maxwell: The Making of a Monster
programme.desc: This instalment of the documentary charts events in the steady demise of Ghislaine Maxwell. The socialite narrowly escaped an initial police investigation into the sexual abuse of dozens of underage girls in Epsteins Florida mansion. However, her subsequent rehabilitation as an environmentalist was scuppered when she went on the offensive against an accuser. Lawyers of survivors explain their innovative strategy that forced Ghislaine into a corner. It initiated a domino effect that eventually led to an ultimate reckoning - at the criminal trial that found her guilty in December 2021

programme.title: The Last Leg
programme.desc: Adam Hills, Josh Widdicombe and Alex Brooker are joined by Harriet Kemsley and Katherine Ryan for a comic review of the significant moments of the past seven days. As usual, the hashtag #isitok paves the way for the gang to round up, examine and explain the leading and most entertaining news stories of the week

programme.title: The Serpent Queen
programme.desc: King Henri sets off to lead an army defending France, and puts Catherine in charge as regent in his absence, which gives her an opportunity to further test her powers. Diane insists on accompanying Henri to the front lines. But when Henri sends word to Catherine that supplies are running low and more funds are needed, the privy council refuses to help her

programme.title: The Serpent Queen
programme.desc: Catherine has a dream that predicts that her husband will be mortally wounded while jousting. And after Catherine begins to distrust Mary, she and Henri decide their eldest son Francis should delay his wedding

programme.title: Secrets of the Royal Palaces
programme.desc: Kate Williams explores the history of Sandringham in Norfolk, which is one of the few royal residences owned personally by the Windsors. It was purchased in 1861 for the rakish Prince Edward in the hopes he would settle down in the countryside, but instead he turned it into the perfect party palace, with a bowling alley, billiards and endless hunting and shooting. The historian also reveals how Prince Philip once proposed demolishing the place to make way for a more modern replacement, before being forced to relent by the Queen Mother

programme.title: The Goldbergs
programme.desc: A day at the roller-skating rink leaves Murray wishing he had not asked Erica to tell him about her life, while Pops steps in to help when a back-to-school shopping trip causes problems between Beverly and Adam. Comedy, starring Jeff Garlin, Wendi McLendon-Covey and Hayley Orrantia

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Tony begins his physio sessions with Mercedes support, and with the truth now revealed, tension rises between two residents

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Warren tries his best to support Mercedes, but his scorned ex-girlfriend is never far away. Guilt consumes one resident, Frankie opens up about her past, and a new mum continues to struggle

programme.title: Rude(ish) Tube
programme.desc: Comedy clips showcasing amusing internet videos on the themes of food and animals

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay is in Redondo Beach, California, for the first of two visits to Zayna Flaming Grill, a Mediterranean restaurant owned and run by aunt and niece Faye and Brenda. Faye believes she has the weight of the entire restaurant on her shoulders, while Brenda feels she isnt treated as an equal in the business. With tensions rising, the food not up to scratch and everyone playing the blame game, the chef is faced with one of the trickiest situations hes ever encountered

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay concludes his visit to Zayna Flaming Grill in Redondo Beach, California, and finds more questions than answers as he tries to save the crisis-ridden restaurant from disaster. While trying to inject some much-needed flavour into the tired Mediterranean menu, the chef also encourages aunt-and-niece duo Faye and Brenda to settle their differences

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Mr Burns attempts to fulfil his lifelong ambition of becoming a superhero and take down a rogues gallery of familiar faces, but devoted sidekick Smithers secretly intervenes after noticing his boss isnt quite up to the challenge. Lisa steps in as Barts attorney when he is falsely accused of pulling an Easter prank

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer is recruited to be a church deacon by the trendy new reverend - but when he starts to embrace the faith a little too seriously, Bart asks Flanders to help him track down their former pastor, the Rev Lovejoy. Meanwhile, the dry cleaners mistakenly swap Marges wedding dress for one of Krustys clown costumes. With the guest voice of Edward Norton

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard and Sheldon disagree over whether to continue holding their regular Roommate Agreement meetings, with Leonard suggesting they are no longer required, while Sheldon believes they are still essential. As the pairs squabble quickly escalates into a full-blown argument, the rest of their friends turn up for a planned Game of Thrones viewing party, and end up taking sides in the dispute - resulting in two warring factions taking up residence in 4A and 4B. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki and Jim Parsons

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The gang goes to a bar and runs into Pennys old boyfriend Zack, while Bernadette is left to spend the evening with Sheldon when she cannot go wine tasting with the others. Elsewhere, things do not go to plan when Raj introduces his new girlfriend, Claire. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Part one of two. Mitch and Cam prepare to walk down the aisle, but are faced with a host of hitches before they tie the knot. Pepper is forced to bring the ceremony forward by four hours because of a spreading wildfire, while one of the grooms tuxedos has been left at the dry cleaners

programme.title: Modern Family
programme.desc: Part two of two. With Mitch and Cams big day beset by one disaster after another, Pepper is forced to find a new venue - only for the couple to be forced out once again. Their only option is to hold the ceremony at home - but then Sal, who supposed to be marrying them, is forced to leave. Will they ever get to say I do? Elizabeth Banks guest stars

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny feels threatened when a sexy actress, who has landed a role in TV series CSI, moves into the apartment building, and gradually begins to sense that her friends are being manipulated by the new arrival. Comedy, starring Kaley Cuoco, Valerie Azlynn, Johnny Galecki and Simon Helberg

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny catches the eye of comic-book shopkeeper Stuart, and Leonard is devastated when she gives serious consideration to dating her new admirer. Desperate for help, Leonard enlists Sheldon to discredit his love rival by preying on his obsession with Batman. Johnny Galecki, Kaley Cuoco and Kevin Sussman star

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Stuart takes Penny out for a second date, during which she drunkenly reveals her true feelings. Meanwhile, Howard uncovers a flaw in the toilet he designed for a Nasa space shuttle, and asks his friends to help him correct it before the launch. Kaley Cuoco, Kevin Sussman and Simon Helberg star

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon wins a grant to pay for a summer expedition to the North Pole, and invites his friends to join him. However, the gangs imminent departure causes Leonard and Penny to reconsider their feelings for each other. Johnny Gale and Kaley Cuoco star

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.sub-title: A Sneeze, Detention and Sissy Spacek
programme.desc: When his germophobia lands him in detention when flu season hits Medford, Sheldon takes extreme measures to remain healthy. Comedy, starring Iain Armitage

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.sub-title: Potato Salad, a Broomstick and Dads Whiskey
programme.desc: When Mary takes a job as church secretary, she finds herself becoming a marriage counsellor to Pastor Jeff. Sheldon and Missy spend their first afternoon at home alone. Comedy, starring Iain Armitage and Raegan Revord

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: After a failed Black Friday shopping spree, Marge is determined to fix Christmas, but Homer and the kids surprise Marge with a holiday at a Florida resort

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Marge and Homer leave Grampa to babysit the kids, but little green army men trigger a PTSD episode, sending the family on a journey to Abes past when he was a postwar toy model

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The friends fight over a ring they believe was used in the Lord of the Rings film trilogy. Leonard hopes to return the item to its rightful owner - but Raj wishes to sell it so he can buy a jet ski, and Sheldon develops a Gollum-like obsession with the precious object

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon is awarded a prestigious prize by the university, but is scared of collecting the gong at a ceremony because he knows hell have to give a speech. Penny tries to gee him up with rousing references to X-Men, and Leonard and Raj offer psychological guidance - without much success

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard tells Penny he loves her, but fails to get the response he would have liked. Sheldon also finds himself competing against Star Trek: The Next Generation actor Wil Wheaton once again when the gang goes bowling - and tries to get his revenge

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon tries to hide the fact he had dinner with Penny after she broke up with Leonard, hoping to stay friends with her. However, keeping secrets does not prove to be his strong point, and it isnt long before his deceit is exposed. Comedy, starring Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco and Johnny Galecki

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Marge and rebellious new friend Ruth set off for a girls night out - but end up being pursued at high speed through the streets of Springfield by Chief Wiggum and a distraught Homer

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer and Marge buy a self-help video to improve their lives - but make the mistake of enlisting Bart and Lisas assistance. Featuring the voices of James Brown and Albert Brooks

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Sienna, Dodger and the McQueens step in to help new mum Cleo as she finally gets the support she needs. The Osbornes get to know Frankies new beau. And new resident Gemma tries to build bridges with Mercedes

programme.title: Animal Control
programme.desc: Frank and Shred take on an aggressive swan, and Shred meets a mysterious woman. And Emilys mistake leaves Victoria with very little time to prepare for her big exam

programme.title: Americas Next Top Model
programme.desc: The contestants produce how-to videos for a cosmetics company, and celebrity stylist Rachel Zoe guest judges as they model selections from her faux-fur collection

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: The armchair critics share their opinions on shows including Strictly Come Dancing, Our Dementia Choir Sings Again with Vicky McClure, First Dates Hotel, My Possessed Pet, This Morning, The Ex-Wife and Sue Perkins: Perfectly Legal. Plus, thoughts on ITV News of possible power shortages. First shown in October 2022

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc: An edition from October 2022, in which the armchair critics share their opinions on what they have been watching during the week, with cameras capturing their instant reactions to I Can See Your Voice, Emmerdale, Strictly Come Dancing, Unbreakable, The Ex-Wife, Bargain Hunt, and news coverage of a new Chancellor

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Laboratory engineer Daniel, 39, attempts to keep his nerves under control when he meets 29-year-old lingerie designer Lauren, while six foot three firefighter Nikki hopes rugby player Ross will sweep her off her feet. Call centre worker Zoe, 21, is looking for an intelligent and ladylike bookworm and sits down for a meal with Grace, a well-read 22-year-old physics student with a penchant for grammatical correctness, and HR adviser Leah, 34, is matched with 37-year-old blue-eyed boy Andy from Middlesbrough

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The guys become stranded in the middle of nowhere when Leonards car is stolen en route to the Bakersfield comic-book convention. Meanwhile, back at home, the women try to work out why the guys are so fascinated with such publications

programme.desc: Sheldon is furious when the university forces him to work with Kripke, while Howards hobby lands him in financial trouble. However, that doesnt stop him and Raj getting expensive action figures of themselves made - much to Bernadettes disapproval

programme.title: Time Lock
programme.desc: A boy manages to get himself locked in a bank vault. With 63 hours before the device opens, the authorities are left facing a race against time to free the lad before he runs out of air. Thriller, starring Robert Beatty, Betty McDowall, Vincent Winter, Lee Patterson and a young Sean Connery in an early role

programme.title: The Sound Barrier
programme.desc: An aircraft manufacturer risks alienating his friends and family in a single-minded attempt to prove planes can exceed the speed of sound. David Leans drama, written by Terence Rattigan and starring Ralph Richardson, Ann Todd, Nigel Patrick, Dinah Sheridan and Denholm Elliott

programme.title: Outcast of the Islands
programme.desc: A clerk in a South Seas trading post is sacked after being accused of stealing. After faking his suicide, he reacquaints himself with the trading ship captain who befriended him as a 12-year-old boy. The seafarer agrees to help him regain his reputation, but his trust is soon exploited. Drama, starring Ralph Richardson and Trevor Howard

programme.title: Dads Army
programme.desc: The ragtag soldiers of the Walmington-on-Sea Home Guard are given the chance to prove their mettle by apprehending three German aviators who have parachuted into the country in the vanguard of a suspected Nazi invasion. Comedy based on the TV series, starring Arthur Lowe, John Le Mesurier, Clive Dunn, Bill Pertwee, Ian Lavender and Arnold Ridley

programme.title: Fatherhood
programme.desc: A father brings up his baby girl as a single dad after the unexpected death of his wife who died a day after their daughters birth. Comedy drama, starring Kevin Hart and Alfre Woodard

programme.title: Free Guy
programme.desc: Guy lives a fairly monotonous life as a bank employee. That is until he meets the girl of his dreams and realises hes an NPC within a massive open world video game. Does he deviate from the life hes always lived or does he follow his dream girl into the unknown future? Adventure comedy, starring Ryan Reynolds, Jodie Comer, Taika Waititi and Lil Rel Howery

programme.title: Salt
programme.desc: A CIA agent is accused of being a sleeper assassin with a deadly purpose - to kill the Russian president during a diplomatic visit and start a third world war. She goes on the run, with her colleagues in hot pursuit - but each attempt to prove her innocence only raises more questions about her identity. Action thriller, starring Angelina Jolie, Liev Schreiber and Chiwetel Ejiofor. In English, and Russian and Korean with English subtitles

programme.title: My Friend Dahmer
programme.desc: The early years of Ohio serial killer Jeffrey Dahmer are charted in this drama inspired by his friend Derf Backderfs graphic novel, starring Ross Lynch, Anne Heche and Alex Wolff

programme.title: Payroll
programme.desc: The widow of an armoured car driver swears revenge on the criminals who killed him - leading them to turn on each other. Crime drama, starring Michael Craig and Billie Whitelaw

programme.title: A Kid for Two Farthings
programme.desc: A six-year-old boy from Londons East End is fascinated by the stories of an elderly neighbour, who tells him about the strange powers of the mythical unicorn. The lad sets out to find such a magical beast, only to encounter a single-horned goat. Certain he has found the creature he was looking for, he takes it home - and sets about trying to make wishes come true. Drama, with Jonathan Ashmore, Celia Johnson, Diana Dors and David Kossoff

programme.title: The Man Between
programme.desc: A German racketeer risks his life to rescue a kidnapped British girl from communists in post-war Berlin and escort her back to safety - but is forced to make a tremendous sacrifice to ensure her survival. Drama, starring James Mason, Claire Bloom, Hildegarde Neff, Geoffrey Toone, Aribert Waescher and Ernst Schroeder

programme.title: Two Way Stretch
programme.desc: Three convicts plot to sneak out of prison, steal a fortune in diamonds from a maharajah, and then creep back in to provide themselves with the perfect alibi. However, their seemingly flawless plan is threatened by the arrival of a strict new prison officer. Comedy, starring Peter Sellers, Bernard Cribbins and Lionel Jeffries

programme.title: Central Intelligence
programme.desc: Action comedy, starring Dwayne Johnson as a one-time geek who suffered constant humiliation at high school but grew up to be a lethal CIA agent. But when he is targeted by his own organisation, he comes home for a high school reunion, where he enlists the help of the former campus tough guy - now a meek accountant - who very quickly wonders what he has got himself into. Co-starring Kevin Hart and Amy Ryan

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: A cops career is seemingly over when he accidentally shoots a hostage while thwarting a bank robbery. He is given the chance to redeem himself by joining an elite unit headed by a veteran sergeant. Their mission is to escort an international crime lord in custody as he is taken to prison. However, they hit a snag when their prisoner offers a multimillion-dollar reward to anyone who breaks him out of jail, placing them under attack from every criminal in the city. Action thriller, starring Samuel L Jackson and Colin Farrell

programme.title: The Long Good Friday
programme.desc: A ruthless London crime lord tries to extend his dockland empire by exploring business opportunities in America. When his organisation is the target of a series of bombings, he discovers a mysterious syndicate is trying to muscle in on his territory, and resorts to increasingly brutal methods to expose the culprits. Gritty thriller, starring Bob Hoskins, Helen Mirren, Dave King and Bryan Marshall, with Pierce Brosnan and former Casualty star Derek Thompson in supporting roles

programme.title: Chopper
programme.desc: Fact-based Australian drama charting the rise and fall of notorious criminal Mark Chopper Read, based on events described in his best-selling autobiographical books, some of which he wrote while serving a jail sentence for murder. Starring Eric Bana, Simon Lyndon, David Field, Daniel Wyllie and Bill Young

A centurion who survives the massacre takes charge of the survivors and leads them on a daring mission to rescue their captured general and make it back to their own territory alive. Neil Marshalls action thriller, with Michael Fassbender, Dominic West and Olga Kurylenko

programme.title: Last Knights
programme.desc: A warrior is left a broken man when the nobleman he serves is put to death for refusing to pay tribute to a corrupt warlord. He seeks to redeem himself by reuniting his dead masters other soldiers and leading them into battle to avenge his death. Medieval action adventure, starring Clive Owen and Morgan Freeman

Period drama, starring Jim Carter, Phyllis Logan, Elizabeth McGovern and Laura Carmichael

programme.desc: PC Steve Crane takes an urgent phone call, and is shocked to discover Peter Pykes warehouse has gone up in smoke. It soon emerges that the owners wife had spent time behind bars for fraud, and her husband is reluctant to answer questions - leading Merton to suspect the blaze was deliberate. Meanwhile, Vernon moves into his new mansion, but has trouble keeping up with his well-to-do neighbours. Rural drama, starring James Carlton, Duncan Bell and Geoffrey Hughes

programme.desc: Liz Merrick faces a trying time when one of her patients misses an appointment to discuss medication, and subsequently ends up charged with drink-driving, while Vernons pal David is kidnapped and held to ransom. programme.title: Rosemary and Thyme
programme.desc: Rosemary and Laura are employed to restore a country churchyard in time for a medieval fair, but it is not long before a local landowner is killed by an arrow beneath an ancient yew in the centre of the graveyard. The duo investigate the possibility that rival bidders for the victims highly desirable farm are to blame - though affairs of the heart might offer a more likely motive. Drama, starring Felicity Kendal and Pam Ferris

Can new father Barnaby untangle a web of jealousy and obsession to find the killer? With Fiona Dolman, Tamzin Malleson, Liberty Mills, Una Stubbs and Georgia Taylor

programme.title: Chateau DIY

programme.title: The Great House Giveaway
programme.desc: Property manager Shelley and electrical supervisor David have six months to transform a beautiful canal-side terrace in Burscough, Ormskirk, into a family home. The house hasnt been touched for 50 years and only has a downstairs bathroom, so they decide to rip everything out and start again. However, with a tight budget and house prices tumbling, the possibility of making any profit looks far from being guaranteed. Presented by Tayo Oguntonade, Simon OBrien and Carys Davies

programme.title: A Place in the Sun

Now they want to swap their house in Hampshire for their perfect home in the warmer climes of inland Valencia, Spain. With a maximum budget of £280,000, the pair look to property expert Jean Johansson to help them realise their dream

programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Home or Away
programme.desc: Joe and Di Lunn relocated to Australia in 1967 to bring up their five children. Now that their youngest daughter has moved back to Yorkshire, theyre looking for a holiday home thats within easy reach of her where they can spend up to five months of the year. However, they cant decide on where it should be. Joe wants to return to his Yorkshire roots while Di wants to buy in Normandy France. With a budget of £140,000 Jasmine Harman shows them three fantastic properties in West Yorkshire, while Jonnie Irwin tries to tempt them with three French homes

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Flamboyant 49-year-old performing arts teacher Helen gets the party started in Sheffield. Her cooking doesnt go to plan, but she certainly delivers on the entertainment, on a whirlwind evening featuring trumping, spies and a dessert that goes with a bang

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Design and technology teacher Claire hosts the second day of the competition in Sheffield, and hopes her Asian-inspired menu with a spot of clay model-making will impress her fellow diners enough to net her the points shell need to secure the cash prize. However, former chef Simon Hollings proves difficult to faze, and the eccentric Helen irritates the other contestants with another audacious display at the dinner table

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Service administrator Monika hosts the third night of a week of dinner parties in Sheffield. She treats her guests to a traditional Bulgarian night inspired by her homeland, in the hope of impressing them enough to win the £1,000 prize money. However, some of the guests are unsure about her Bulgarian delicacies, and the host must fight for control when the two teachers go head to head and when Simon makes sexist jokes

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: After tensions arose between Claire and Helen on Monikas night, 1980s musician Ivor is determined to serve up some fun on his evening in Sheffield. He stages an 80s extravaganza, including a live performance from his new romantic band My Pierrot Dolls

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Former chef Simon hosts the final meal in Sheffield, but is unlikely to get an easy ride from his guests following all the criticism he has dished out at the earlier soirees. He also has to contend with the feud thats brewing between Claire and Helen, and when things boil over between the women, Monika doesnt know where to hide

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The first visit of the week is to The Lazy Pug in Warwickshire. Friends Ash and Rosie are hoping to win over their guests with quirky rooms and a healthy dose of neon lights

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The rivals head to the Crofts Hotel in Cardiff, run by chef Lorraine. However, the guests are uninspired by the bland decoration and feel that everything is a bit basic

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The rivals spend the night at the Hollybush Inn in Priors Marston, Warwickshire, where owner Anthony hopes to wow his guests with the 16th-century coaching inns history

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The guest house owners arrive at The Pretty Thing glampsite in St Osyth, Essex, run by Phil. Theres a melee of mixed emotions when the guests arrive, with Lorraine and Anthony left feeling cold by the communal showers, while Ash and Rosie embrace all the impressive luxury their Aztec tent has to offer. Over drinks, Phil lets slip that the breakfast service the following morning will be his first ever

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Its the final day of the competition, and the BandBers reconvene to feud about facilities, bicker over beds and cross swords over sausages, before the payments are revealed and the winner announced. Garish neon lights, dogs at breakfast and cleanliness issues are on the agenda as the hoteliers get heated while discussing a colourful week

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc: Design engineer Joe Stuart and service designer Lina Nilsson take on the London property market, as they build their own home on a small 38-square-metre plot. Joe designs a split-level house that will cleverly maximise the space, but the project soon runs months behind schedule, and thousands of pounds over their £160,000 budget

programme.title: 24 Hours in Police Custody
programme.sub-title: 24 Hours in Police Custody: The Unusual Suspects
programme.desc: How the new routes behind large scale cannabis importation are leading police to some very different suspects, far from the gangs who traditionally ran the drugs trade. Detectives in Luton CID take on a case after UK Border Force intercept multiple packages of cannabis addressed to properties across Bedfordshire, whole DC Adam Geary is handed what will become the biggest investigation of his career

programme.title: Night Coppers
programme.desc: On the beat with the police officers who patrol the city of Brighton after dark. Adrenaline-seeking officers Dakota and Dan are assigned to an over-zealous Brighton football fan whos been knocked out in the street. Best friends Annie and Jack are put through their paces with some midnight cardio exercise when a man accused of assault bolts on foot and solo officer Emily is tasked with tracking down some youths in a fight

programme.title: 999: On the Front Line
programme.desc: A night out with friends ends badly when a car crashes into two vehicles as police, firefighters and the paramedics attend the scene. In Birmingham, a young woman is found lying collapsed and unconscious in a car park, a family night in playing board games ends with a man lying unconscious on the kitchen floor and a young woman whose gall bladder operation has been postponed due to the Covid-19 pandemic cannot cope with the pain any longer

programme.title: 24 Hours in Police Custody
programme.sub-title: 24 Hours in Police Custody: The Unusual Suspects
programme.desc: How the new routes behind large scale cannabis importation are leading police to some very different suspects, far from the gangs who traditionally ran the drugs trade. Detectives in Luton CID take on a case after UK Border Force intercept multiple packages of cannabis addressed to properties across Bedfordshire, whole DC Adam Geary is handed what will become the biggest investigation of his career

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: Marie, 31, arrives at St Georges AandE in south-west London by ambulance after collapsing at home with an unexplained headache. Doctors work fast to ascertain the cause of her collapse, with potentially devastating results. Maries joined by her partner Cameron and her young child. Cameras also follow Eileen, 87, who comes in with shortness of breath and a high heart rate, and 10-month-old Erin, who has a build-up of wax in her ears following a cold and fever

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: Cyclist Stephen, whos 48, has severely damaged his ankle after coming off his bike deep in woodland in Surrey, and doctors treat a man rushed in after collapsing with a suspected stroke in his garden. Meanwhile, Bridget, whos 70, broke her wrist when she slipped on a mountain path in Greece

programme.title: Food Unwrapped
programme.desc: The team returns to explore the secrets behind mass-produced food, meeting technicians, scientists, factory owners, growers and producers, finding out exactly what goes into the everyday groceries that end up on the supermarket shelves. Jimmy Doherty finds out how Sri Lanka is coping with a looming coconut shortage, while Kate Quilton discovers whether compostables could be the answer to worldwide plastic pollution problem, annd Matt Tebbutt is in Paris to learn why the macaron has such a hefty price tag

programme.title: Chateau DIY
programme.desc: Amy and Marc learn new skills to make their own wine, while Edward plans to build a hi-tech chicken coop - only for his feathered friends to give him the runaround

programme.title: Chateau DIY
programme.desc: Amy and Marc receive an award for their renovations and host a picnic in their garden for 60 of the organisations members. However, the garden is criss-crossed by open trenches for all their ongoing plumbing and electrical work. Becky and Mark are under pressure to complete their final guest room, but they still find time to introduce their daughters to two new kittens. In north-west France, Philip and Angelina are flat-out preparing for the event season. The moat must be navigated to smarten up the châteaus enormous shutters and Angelina makes over a kilometre of bunting. Narrated by Adjoa Andoh

programme.title: The Great House Giveaway
programme.desc: Resource manager Alixe and trainee carpenter Loy have six months to transform a two-bedroom semi in Abercarn, south Wales, into a family home. Its not in bad condition, but Alixe and Loy cross swords over whether to knock through the living room. They compromise by putting a skylight into the small dark kitchen. The renovation goes to the wire and with only a few days left to sell, will the house make a profit? Tayo Oguntonade, Simon OBrien and Carys Davies monitor events

programme.title: The Great House Giveaway
programme.desc: Painter and decorator Sami and operations manager Lennon are given a bedraggled 1960s semi in St Helens. In one of the shows fastest renovations ever, they create a kitchen-diner and still come in under budget. But will their eye for a bargain cost them their profit in a market where its all about the finish?

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Chef Mark and yoga teacher Loretta, who live in west London, have been together for 15 years after meeting in Lorettas native Australia. programme.title: A Place in the Sun: Home or Away
programme.desc: Derek and Julie Kalinski want to buy a holiday home where they can enjoy their retirement together. However, Julia wants to buy a property closer to home on the north Devon coast, while keen sailor Derek dreams of owning a French property in Brittany. Using a budget of £400,000 Jasmine Harman goes all out flying the flag for north Devon, while Jonnie Irwin tempts them with some stunning properties in France

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Hairdresser Julie hosts the first of a week of dinner parties in Co Durham, hoping to win over her guests with a no-nonsense menu she can prepare in advance. Joining her are tough-talking prison transport officer Tina, dreadlocked farm-dweller Stephen, superior IT manager David and glamorous beauty-school teacher Ashleigh. Alliances are quickly forged when David and Tina discover they both love a good gossip, before they turn their attention to Stephen when David compares him to a tramp. Julie overcooks her beef, but will her hosting make up for it and bag her the £1,000 prize?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Beauty teacher Ashleigh throws the second of the weeks parties in Co Durham, she hopes a menu of sophisticated dishes - along with a helping of hearts and love - will help her win the cash prize. However, cracks were already beginning to show in the diners genial facade yesterday, and the hostess realises she must play peacemaker if she is to keep everyone from falling out

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Call centre complaints officer and part-time farmer Stephen hosts the third night of a week of dinner parties in Co Durham. However, self-confessed snob Tina makes it perfectly clear what she thinks of his efforts

programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
